instructions: Tap the cloud icon in the history bar at the top of the screen (if one is there), or open the main menu and select Network > Cloud Drive . Tap Log in to Google Drive to connect to your Google account, or tap Log in with other cloud drive to connect to One Drive, Box.net, or Dropbox. After syncing your accounts, the Cloud Drive screen will show folders representing all your cloud services. Tap the plus sign ( + ) to add additional ones.
